Original:

The meals and atmosphere are good,

Original: 前幾天跟朋友們來小酌～氣氛很好，服務一極棒！餐點也美味～Jeffrey很詳細的介紹酒類～調酒都很驚艷～下次還會再來！

Original: 趕上了無限暢飲的時間，服務人員非常親切專業積極。雖然無限暢飲有酒單限制，但項目很足夠，調酒的口味也十分有誠意、有層次（不像許多酒吧的調酒都只是加香精糖漿），並且附上免費招待的餅乾還有可愛的餐桌野餐風佈置。外國歌手和演奏的現場表演，非常專業美好。

Original:
之前就聽友人推薦過這間Bar，於是在某個尋找續攤地點的夜晚，就近去了這裡。文華東方酒店本身就已經是豪華酒店了，裡面的Bar當然也是走高格調路線，不過我和友人一致覺得這裡的酒實在是太甜了，有點接受不能。幾乎該說酒的主體是糖漿，而酒才是添加的配料。

這次造訪有點不順，首先是受到Covid-19疫情影響，酒店正門晚間緊閉，只開了一個很偏遠的入口，我們幾乎把酒店繞完才找到這個入口（喘）；再來是當時是平日晚間近10點，1樓商場全部關門、連個警衛都沒有，我們看著1樓服裝商店櫥窗裡的人體模特兒，感覺自己活像闖入恐怖遊戲裡的賣場似的，前方轉角真出現個怪都不意外了。
EN:
I heard my friends recommend this BAR before, so I went here near a night when I was looking for a renewal place.Mandarin Oriental Hotel itself is already a luxury hotel. Of course, BAR is also a high -style route. However, my friends and I think the wine here is too sweet, and I can't accept it.Almost the main body of wine is syrup, and wine is the ingredients added.

This visit was a bit unpleasant. First of all, affected by the covid-19 epidemic, the hotel was closed at night, and only a very remote entrance was opened. Nearly 10 o'clock in the evening, all the malls on the first floor were closed and there were no guards. We looked at the human models in the window of the clothing store on the 1st floor, and felt like we were living in the store in the horror game. No surprise.

Original: 當我從五F電梯走出來，看到MO BAR外牆玻璃黑暗，以為今天沒營業。還好我往前走，原來有營業。進來超過一個小時，視覺仍然覺得今天是停電嗎？酒單看不清楚，要用拍照。最裡面幾乎是沒有光線，氣氛感覺不好。連拍照都像鬼店⋯⋯給三顆星，因為bartender和酒，還有外場服務是五顆星。
EN: When I came out of the Five F elevator, I saw Mo Bar's outer wall dark, thinking that it was not open today.Fortunately, I went forward, and it turned out to be open.After coming in for more than an hour, does the vision still feel that today is the power outage?The wine list is not clear, and take pictures.The innermost is almost no light, and the atmosphere feels bad.Even taking pictures is like a ghost shop, three stars, because Bartender and wine, as well as five stars in the field service.

Original:
酒類選擇種類多，調酒也相當有水準。
配酒餐點、海鮮都非常新鮮。

Original:
全程服務非常好。
調酒除了富有創意，也有視覺精致的美感，很適合與好友放鬆小酌。

座落於各地的文華東方酒店，都以品味優雅精致，超高水準的餐飲與服務為人稱道。

很可惜M.O.Bar有個鬆散的廚房。
為何M.O.Bar食物品項選擇極少，仍無法控制品質？
炸薯條這麼不需要烹飪技巧的餐點，都能油到薯條整條是透明的能捏出油來？
其次是總匯三明治，有兩種吐司可供選擇，再三強調要白麵包，外場也確定給廚房的點單是白麵包，然後...上桌的是全麥麵包。
既然堅持給全麥，何必提供兩種麵包選擇呢？

以上這些如果是出現在連鎖速食店，都是不值一提的問題。
但出現在文華東方酒店？
EN:
The full service is very good.
In addition to creativeness, bartending also has the aesthetics of visual exquisiteness, which is very suitable for relaxation with friends.

The Mandarin Oriental Hotel located in various places is commendable with elegant and exquisite, high -level catering and services.

It's a pity that M.O.Bar has a loose kitchen.
Why does M.O.BAR have very little food items and still cannot control the quality?
French fries that do not require cooking skills, can it be oily to the fries and the whole piece of fries can be transparent to pinch oil?
The second is the Sanmingzhi. There are two kinds of toast to choose from. It repeatedly emphasizes white bread. The outfield is also determined to give the kitchen order for white bread, and then ... the whole wheat bread is on the table.
Now that you insist on giving Quanmai, why provide two bread options?

If the above appear in the chain fast food shop, it is not worth mentioning.
But appear at Mandarin Oriental Hotel?
